page.title: 19Recreation
page.content: At Hillsiode along the A384 at Merrivale there is a popular riding school where riders may enjoy the freedom and views of the surrounding moor. The discontinued railway track from Plymouth to Princetown runs through the area. Walking along this track is a pastime which many local people indulge in. Some of the views from here are quite breathtaking. The young and agile enjoy climbing the Tors, such as Vixen Tor and Pew Tor. Here too is a favourite picnic spot, and in the rocky basin which is full of rainwater, the children love fishing - especially for frog and toad spawn. Hidden in the rocks below Pew Tor is a"Dartmoor Letterbox".
